dt-example.title: Document Generator
dt-example.info:
This is the Document Generator plug-in for Buttons. It allows for documents to be built on the server side and downloaded on the client side. This example shows the csv export.
The server-side code can be found [here](). It is powered using NodeJS.
The data can be retrieved and set using the `-api docgen.parse()` method. The structure of the JSON object is fully [documented]().
